result.execSummary:
The defendant Ivan D Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 4 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ivan D Robinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Return to Sender: Not deliverable as addressed-Unable to Forward. Letter adding additional case/cases with balance to payment plan.

Defendant Ivan D Robinson in court with attorney Brett A Ekes.  Michael Patrick White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Def is requesting an adjournment.
This matter will be resolved.
State does not object.
BTC: Matter adjourned.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.

Pre-trial conference at 11-19-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 12-21-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with victim store, Pick and Save except for restitution purposes.   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Ivan D Robinson in court with attorney Gregory Austin Holdahl.  Defendant Ivan D Robinson in custody.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
